resources.string: For PlayMarket 2.0 to work on your version of Android, we need permission to save files on your phone.\n\nThis is only used for saving your wallet info and installers for purchased apps.

This is the account management section.



Here you can view your address and make an encrypted copy of your wallet.

Congratulations! You've made a new user.


It is important to make a copy of your account's keys. Click Backup Wallet to copy your wallet to the clipboard. Save it somewhere safe and then click continue.

Your address:
